modelPicker.noModels: Could not load models from `opencode models`. Enter a model ID manually.

auto.title: Auto Install
auto.subtitle: Quick installation with optional preferences
auto.featureOmoDefaults: Uses npx when available, otherwise installs Bun via Homebrew

advanced.title: Advanced Configuration
advanced.warningNoClaudeSubscription: Warning: Sisyphus agent might not work ideally without Claude subscription.

errors.failedToStartWeb: Failed to start OpenCode Web. Please try restarting the app.

manualStart.title: OpenCode Web is set to manual start
manualStart.subtitle: Start it now when you want to open the web UI.

messages.saveWillRestartConfirm: Saving these changes will restart OpenCode. Continue?

theme.label: Theme
theme.description: Theme preset used by the CLI and UI surfaces.

defaultModel.label: Default Model
defaultModel.description: Primary model used for normal coding and reasoning tasks.

smallModel.label: Small Model
smallModel.description: Lower-cost model for lightweight tasks and fast helper operations.

defaultAgent.label: Default Agent
defaultAgent.description: Agent profile selected by default when no agent is explicitly specified.

username.label: Username
username.description: Name shown in generated content where a user identity is needed.

logLevel.label: Log Level
logLevel.description: Controls log verbosity. Higher levels include more diagnostic details.

apiKey.label: API Key
apiKey.help: Provider authentication token. Leave empty only for providers that do not require credentials.

baseUrl.label: Base URL
baseUrl.help: Custom API endpoint for this provider. Use when running through a proxy, gateway, or compatible self-hosted service.

models.label: Models
models.help: Model IDs available for this provider. Enter one model per line.

enabled.label: Enabled
enabled.help: Enable or disable this MCP server without removing its configuration.

type.label: Type
type.help: `local` launches a command on this machine. `remote` connects to an MCP server over HTTP(S).

command.label: Command (one arg per line)
command.help: Command and arguments for launching a local MCP server. Enter one token per line, for example: npx, -y, package-name.

environment.label: Environment (KEY=VALUE)
environment.help: Environment variables for local MCP execution. One KEY=VALUE pair per line.

url.label: URL
url.help: Base endpoint for the remote MCP server.

headers.label: Headers
headers.help: HTTP headers for remote MCP requests.

timeout.label: Timeout (ms)
timeout.help: Tool discovery timeout in milliseconds. Leave empty to use OpenCode default (5000ms).

model.label: Model
model.help: Model identifier used by this agent profile.

temperature.label: Temperature
temperature.help: Controls randomness. Lower values are more deterministic; higher values are more creative.

steps.label: Steps
steps.help: Maximum tool/reasoning steps the agent can take before finishing.

descriptions.read: Controls access to reading local files.
descriptions.edit: Controls access to editing files in the workspace.
descriptions.bash: Controls access to shell command execution.
descriptions.glob: Controls access to filename pattern searches.
descriptions.grep: Controls access to content pattern searches.
descriptions.fetch: Controls access to fetching data from URLs.
descriptions.mcp: Controls access to MCP server tools and resources.
descriptions.task: Controls access to spawning delegated subagent tasks.

port.label: Port
port.help: Port used by the local opencode server from `opencode.json`.

hostname.label: Hostname
hostname.help: Network interface to bind. `127.0.0.1` keeps access local to your machine.

cors.label: CORS
cors.help: Enables permissive CORS handling for browser-based clients.

auto.label: Auto
auto.help: Automatically compacts session history to reduce size over time.

prune.label: Prune
prune.help: Removes old compacted artifacts that are no longer referenced.

disablePasteSummary.label: Disable Paste Summary
disablePasteSummary.help: Skips automatic summarization when pasting large content blocks.

batchTool.label: Batch Tool
batchTool.help: Enables grouped tool execution mode for eligible operations.

continueLoopOnDeny.label: Continue Loop on Deny
continueLoopOnDeny.help: Allows continuation loops to proceed even if one action is denied.

desktop.hintTop: Settings for OpenCode Desktop app behavior.

launchAtLogin.label: Launch at Login
launchAtLogin.help: Automatically starts OpenCode Desktop when you sign in to your OS account.

backgroundService.label: Background Service (launchd)
backgroundService.help: Runs OpenCode Web as a macOS launchd service. Survives app restarts and auto-recovers from crashes.

updateCheck.label: Desktop Updates
updateCheck.help: Checks GitHub Releases for a newer OpenCode Desktop version.
updateCheck.notCheckedYet: Update check has not run yet.
updateCheck.updateAvailable: Update available: v{current} -> v{latest}. Last checked: {checkedAt}

opencodeUpdate.label: OpenCode Updates
opencodeUpdate.help: Checks and upgrades OpenCode via Homebrew (`brew upgrade opencode`).
opencodeUpdate.notInstalledMessage: OpenCode is not installed on this machine.
opencodeUpdate.notCheckedYet: OpenCode update check has not run yet.
opencodeUpdate.upToDate: OpenCode is up to date (v{current}). Last checked: {checkedAt}
opencodeUpdate.updateAvailable: OpenCode update available: v{current} -> v{latest}. Last checked: {checkedAt}

web.hintTop: Saved in wrapper settings used to launch `opencode --port`.
web.warningInsecureHostname: Warning: hostname 0.0.0.0 without password is network-accessible and unsecured.

port.label: Port
port.help: Port used by the wrapper web server. Leave empty to auto-select an available port.

hostname.label: Hostname
hostname.help: Address to bind for web access. Use `127.0.0.1` for local-only access, `0.0.0.0` to expose on your LAN.
hostname.lockedHelp: Hostname is locked to 0.0.0.0 while Cloudflare Tunnel is enabled.

mdnsDiscovery.label: mDNS Discovery
mdnsDiscovery.help: Advertises the server on local networks so compatible clients can discover it automatically.

mdnsDomain.label: mDNS Domain
mdnsDomain.help: Custom mDNS hostname announced when discovery is enabled.

corsOrigins.label: CORS Origins
corsOrigins.help: Allowed browser origins. Add one origin per line; only listed domains can call the web API from browsers.

authUsername.label: Auth Username
authUsername.help: Username required for HTTP authentication when a password is set.

authPassword.label: Auth Password
authPassword.help: Password for HTTP authentication. Leave empty only for trusted local setups.

extraArgs.label: Extra Args
extraArgs.help: Additional CLI flags passed directly to the web server process.

tunnel.hint: Expose OpenCode Web to the internet via Cloudflare Tunnel.
tunnel.warning: âš  Warning: Enabling Tunnel will expose your OpenCode Web to the external internet. Please ensure authentication is configured in Web settings.

enabled.label: Enabled
enabled.help: Enable Cloudflare Tunnel to expose your local OpenCode instance to the internet.

mode.label: Mode
mode.help: Named Tunnel uses a fixed hostname. Quick Tunnel generates a random temporary URL.

token.label: Token
token.help: Cloudflare Tunnel token. If empty, falls back to CLOUDFLARE_TUNNEL_TOKEN environment variable.

hostname.label: Hostname
hostname.help: Public hostname for your tunnel (e.g., opencode.example.com).

cloudflaredPath.label: cloudflared Path
cloudflaredPath.help: Path to cloudflared binary. Leave empty to use PATH.

quickHost.label: Quick Tunnel Host
quickHost.hostWillAppear: Host will appear here after tunnel starts.

externalRunning.message: Cloudflare Tunnel is already configured on your system
externalRunning.help: An existing Cloudflare Tunnel configuration was detected. Please manage your tunnel settings from the Cloudflare dashboard.

agentFields.permissionBashHelp: For `bash`, choose a global value above or use custom per-command rules below.
